A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am so glad I am not the only one to not like this movie. I was so disappointed. Are the critics being bought or have they never seen a Star Wars movie before? At least this movie answers the question; what happens if Empire and Jedi were one movie. Wait... no one ever asked that question\, so why did they supply us with an answer. I cannot express how bad this movie is and how upset I am because of it. Did anyone except me expect the code breaker to be Lando? What a missed opportunity. Such a mess!
